column5: tackleman. We will be at gullrock may 21st thru 28th and beings it is such a early ice out do you thing crawlers will work? In a normal year it is too early and the bite is only on minnows.
not only will crawlers work so will leechs and minnows i use them all even gulp alive n plain gulp minnows n grubs i catch fish on in gullrock keg etc hope ya have a great holiday hope this helps
